description:
The investment seeks to track the investment results (before fees and expenses) of the S&P 500® High Momentum Value Index (the "underlying index").
 The fund generally will invest at least 90% of its total assets in securities that comprise the underlying index. The index provider selects constituents for the underlying index using a two-step screening process: first, it identifies the 200 stocks from among the approximately 500 stocks in the S&P 500® Index with the highest value scores; second, from among those 200 stocks, it identifies the 100 stocks with the highest positive momentum scores. The fund is non-diversified.
